BodyName: Committee on Sanitation and Solid Waste Management

Items.Title: Oversight - DSNY’s 2015-16 Snow Plan
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to identifying pedestrian bridges for snow and ice removal by the city and establishing a plan for the removal of snow and ice from such bridges.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Identifying pedestrian bridges for snow and ice removal by the city and establishing a plan for the removal of snow and ice from such bridges.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to exempting or partially exempting seniors and certain persons with disabilities from penalties for failing to remove snow or ice from sidewalks, crosswalks, curbs and other locations.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Exempting or partially exempting seniors and certain persons with disabilities from penalties for failing to remove snow or ice from sidewalks, crosswalks, curbs and other locations.

Items.Title: Oversight - DSNY’s 2015-16 Snow Plan
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to identifying pedestrian bridges for snow and ice removal by the city and establishing a plan for the removal of snow and ice from such bridges.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Identifying pedestrian bridges for snow and ice removal by the city and establishing a plan for the removal of snow and ice from such bridges.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to exempting or partially exempting seniors and certain persons with disabilities from penalties for failing to remove snow or ice from sidewalks, crosswalks, curbs and other locations.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Exempting or partially exempting seniors and certain persons with disabilities from penalties for failing to remove snow or ice from sidewalks, crosswalks, curbs and other locations.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending:  The Public Advocate (Ms. James)
